item.title: We're Launching the R-Ladies Rotating Curation Account on Bluesky!
item.description: We’re looking for curators for the We Are R-Ladies Bluesky account!

item.title: Curating for @WeAreRLadies on Twitter
item.description: This post was originally published on Shannon Pileggiâ€™s personal blog. TL; DR In February 2021 I tweeted to a daunting >20k followers by curating for @WeAreLadies on Twitter. This was great opportunity to share knowledge, interact with others, and learn something in return, ultimately cultivating new connections and collaborations.
